title: x/sync: move internal/singleflight to x/sync
body:
I would like to ask if it's possible to move package `internal/singleflight` to `sync/singleflight` for Go1.8?

I've searched the issues and there is already a proposal to move `internal/singleflight` into `x/sync` => https://github.com/golang/go/issues/13058 but it never happend. I would love to see it in `sync/singleflight` instead of `x/sync`. I'm using singleflight nowadays as a copy in my repos like others also copied it. If OK, I can send a CL on Gerrit for the move to `sync/singleflight`.

### What version of Go are you using (`go version`)?

`go version devel +79db162 Fri Sep 30 05:15:19 2016 +0000 darwin/amd64`
